blogs.summary: The chief executive of My Pillow, a Trump donor, claims oleandrin is a miracle cure for Covid-19. But no studies have shown that it is safe or effective, and the shrub it’s derived from is poisonous.

blogs.title: Oleandrin: Trump allies pitch extract from poisonous plant to fight Covid
blogs.summary: Experts raise concern over compound that has not been proven safe but could reach public as dietary supplementAllies of Donald Trump have promoted a plant extract called oleandrin to people seeking to ward off Covid-19. The plant the extract is derived fro
